mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, g_code, b_code, m_code) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{g_code}, #{b_code}, #{m_code})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where bno>0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select * from tbl_board where g_code=#{g_code} and b_code=#{b_code}
select * from tbl_board where g_code = #{g_code} and b_code = #{b_code}
